definitions.definition: The condition of being out of favor; loss of favor, regard, or respect.
The state of being dishonored, or covered with shame.
Something which brings dishonor; the cause of reproach or shame; great discredit.
definitions.example: His behaviour at the party was a total disgrace! He was leeching on all the ladies, and insulting the men.

definitions.definition: An act of unkindness; a disfavor.
To put someone out of favor; to bring shame or ignominy upon.
